products.title: Splash Snow White Panel Blind
products.description: Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Splash snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens or high traffic areas. Panel blinds are their best choice for big windows and their go-to recommendation for french windows and patio doors. Product id: db-pan0263 fabric colour: snow material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash snow white panel blind in white.

products.title: Splash Paper White Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash paper white panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This off-white dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Frost White Panel Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This white panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and white fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Genesis white Panel Blind
products.description: Available in a range of sunny colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. Genesis is also available in their roller and vertical ranges. This whitepanel blind is great for any room to tie whiteinto your colour scheme or follow an exisiting one. The blind can also be used as a room divider - handy. Product id: db-pan0023 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis white panel blind in white.

products.title: Voile FR LL Brilliant White Panel Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This brilliant white panel blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their voile brilliant white panel is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, panelblinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this panel blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.title: Mood FR Voile Cotton White Panel Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cotton white is a semi-translucent stylish, light white panel blind and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant coating makes this sheer panel blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Chatsworth White Panel Blind
products.description: A modern patterned translucent fabric in 3 colour ways. You will also find this design in their vertical and roller blind collections. This crisp white patterned panel blind will freshen up any room and can be used as a room divider. Product id: db-pan0090 fabric colour: white headrail: white aluminium control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes chatsworth white panel blind in white.

products.title: Bella Blackout Snow White Panel Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This brilliant snow white panel blind creates a light and airy look, so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric; to help blockout the light when desired. Product id: db-pan0208 fabric colour: snow white material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white aluminium control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes bella blackout snow white panel blind in white.

products.title: Bella Blackout Paper White Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This paper white panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Frost White Panel Blind
products.description: A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics are simplistic, value for money and come in a wide array of choices. Bella blackout frost white is perfect for large windows or spaces, as they reach up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop. Their panel blinds are cut to your sizes by their expert panel blind team. At swift direct blinds we are so confident of the quality of their products, we provide a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Eco Friendly FR White Panel Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white panel blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Uniview 3000 Crystal White Panel Blind
products.description: Product id: db-pan0330 fabric colour: crystal white material: 30% polyester, 70% vinyl on polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes uniview 3000 crystal white panel blind in white. Made to measure from 55. 68 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

products.title: Splash Frost
products.description: Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm composition: polyester guarantee: 12 months stack: a choice of left, right or split. Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across. Headrail: robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required. Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets. Buy made to measure splash frost standard panel blinds from soeasy blinds.
